verses.verse: <S%H7200>"Behold,<s%> I have <S%H7121>called<s%> by <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1212>Bezalel<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H221>Uri,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2354>Hur,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%>

and I have <S%H4390>filled<s%> him with the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> in <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> and in <S%H8394>understanding,<s%> and in <S%H1847>knowledge,<s%> and in all kinds of <S%H4399>workmanship,<s%>
to <S%H2803>devise<s%> skillful <S%H4284>works,<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%> in <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and in <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and in <S%H5178>brass,<s%>
and in <S%H2799>cutting<s%> of <S%H68>stones<s%> for <S%H4390>setting,<s%> and in <S%H2799>carving<s%> of <S%H6086>wood,<s%> to <S%H6213>work<s%> in all kinds of <S%H4399>workmanship.<s%>

<S%H5414>I,<s%> behold, I have appointed with him <S%H171>Oholiab,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H294>Ahisamach,<s%> of the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan;<s%> and in the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of all who <S%H2450>are<s%> <S%H3820>wise-hearted<s%> I have <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom,<s%> that they may <S%H6213>make<s%> all that I have commanded <S%H6680>you:<s%>
the <S%H168>Tent<s%> of <S%H4150>Meeting,<s%> the <S%H727>ark<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> the mercy <S%H3727>seat<s%> that is on <S%H3627>it,<s%> all the furniture of the <S%H168>Tent,<s%>
the <S%H7979>table<s%> and its <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> the <S%H2889>pure<s%> <S%H4501>lampstand<s%> with all its <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H7004>incense,<s%>
the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of burnt <S%H5930>offering<s%> with all its <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> the <S%H3595>basin<s%> and its <S%H3653>base,<s%>

the finely <S%H8278>worked<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%>—the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H899>garments<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest<s%>—the <S%H899>garments<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> to minister in the <S%H3547>priest<s%>'s office,

the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil,<s%> and the <S%H7004>incense<s%> of <S%H5561>sweet<s%> spices for the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6680>place:<s%> according to all that I have commanded you they shall <S%H6213>do.<s%>"

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> also to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H389><s%> 'Most certainly you shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> my <S%H7676>Sabbaths:<s%> for it is a <S%H226>sign<s%> between me and you throughout your <S%H1755>generations;<s%> that you may <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> who sanctifies <S%H6942>you.<s%>

You shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H6944>therefore;<s%> for it is holy to <S%H2490>you.<s%> Everyone who profanes it shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death;<s%> for whoever <S%H6213>does<s%> any <S%H4399>work<s%> <S%H5315>therein,<s%> that soul shall be cut <S%H3772>off<s%> from <S%H7130>among<s%> his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H8337>Six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> shall <S%H4399>work<s%> be <S%H6213>done,<s%> but on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> day is a <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> of solemn <S%H7677>rest,<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%> Whoever <S%H6213>does<s%> any <S%H4399>work<s%> on the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> be put to <S%H4191>death.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> shall <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H7676>Sabbath,<s%> to <S%H6213>observe<s%> the <S%H7676>Sabbath<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations,<s%> for a <S%H5769>perpetual<s%> <S%H1285>covenant.<s%>

It is a <S%H226>sign<s%> between me and the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5769>forever;<s%> for in <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3117>days<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H8064>heaven<s%> and <S%H776>earth,<s%> and on the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> he <S%H7673>rested,<s%> and was <S%H5314>refreshed.<s%>'"

He <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> when he <S%H3615>finished<s%> <S%H1696>speaking<s%> with him on <S%H2022>Mount<s%> <S%H5514>Sinai,<s%> the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tablets<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony,<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> <S%H3871>tablets,<s%> <S%H3789>written<s%> with <S%H430>God<s%>'s <S%H676>finger.<s%>
